      • handleError

        public ProcessorResponse<T> handleError(@Nonnull
                                        ProcessorResponse<T> errorResponse)
        Handle Error response.

        Note: If the severity of the error is reduced (from FatalError/UnhandledError) the pipeline processing will continue.

        Parameters:
        errorResponse - - Response with Error.
        Returns:
        - Handler Response.
